name: Artillery Royale
description:
In a fantasy universe, you control a team of warriors, with specifics capabilities and weapons to defeat your opponent.

It's an artillery game, where you aim and shoot using a variety of weapons.
Turn by turn you have to kill all the characters of your opponent,
either by inflicting them a deadly shot or throwing them in the lava.
To win this battle use strategy to plan your next move ahead!

Include:
  • More than 20 weird or classic weapons like bazooka, grenade but also some surprise coming up.
  • A random map generator, making each game unique.
  • Multiplayer local games (couch mode with shared screen) or online games.
  • Classic and always fun artillery mechanisms.

Play with physics!

Watch out for the wind, some weapons are very sensible.
Use grenade bounces to achieve (or fail) tricky shots.

Destruct all the things!

The word is fully destructible, make big holes to trap your enemy.
If you are stuck, don't worry and start to dig using your favorite weapon!

Indie game with passionate team listening to your feedback!
Join our discord and let us know what you like, dislike, and where we should move forward.

Coming up:
  • More levels with different atmospheres.
  • More weapon (20 are in the pipe).
  • More character for your team (planed to have 5 classes).
  • Your own idea here.
